Token.Abstract: A PWZoneMessage is a communication (generally marketing-related) sent from the server.
Returns the title of this message. This property will never return a nil value.

Token.Abstract: Returns the expiration date of this message. An application may wish to display messages differently based on their expiration dates. This property will never return a nil value.
